name: MUSHURT (CoraLineLux)
description:
Developers:

Language:

Español-English

-MUSHURT-

Sinopsis:

In the entire county when a violent child is expelled, he is sent to Hurbs, a small religious town that celebrates the mushurt as a custom, a festival about which little is known unless you belong to it

Controls:

WASD-Move

Mouse-Look

Shift-Run/Brake(Bike) 

E-Interact

Q-Drop

Space-Jump

F-Flashlight

Genre:Adventure/horror

This is my first videogame that I manage to finish, with the tremendous help of ReveVoodoo, if any glitches, any problem or if you just feel like it, your freedback will be well received <3
